author: CopyPetPet
text: This, people don't realize how Argentina was in 2018. It was the definition of chaos. Besides probably in Croatia losing 3-0 isn't a big deal since football probably isn't almost a live or die thing like its here, so it makes sense that after failing that drastically against an apparent underdog it was so devastating there was no space for acting like a gentleman.
